subject: Football
Palestinians
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: When the Jets’ Oday Aboushi spoke about his Palestinian-American upbringing at a convention last month, he stirred an outcry online, with some alleging ties to terrorism.
snippet: When the Jets’ Oday Aboushi spoke about his Palestinian-American upbringing at a convention last month, he stirred an outcry online, with some alleging ties to terrorism.
